archimate:Node.name: IoT and Event Hub Broker
archimate:Node.documentation: This clustered node is a collection of software capabilities identified within integration tool or cloud native agent. Event hub handles the large volumes of event streaming from manufacturing plants. Please refer the Garnter's magic quadrant for Enterprise Integration Platform as a Service(ref: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-named-a-leader-in-2023-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-integration-platform-as-a-service-worldwide/).
